title: CraftCommand: Bedrock & Icons Update
notes: Native Bedrock Support: Fully integrated Bedrock Dedicated Server (BDS) orchestration with auto-healing and player tracking.
Custom Server Icons: Support for native server branding (server-icon.png) with real-time dashboard previews.
Distributed Power: Hardened Global Operations Center (GOC) and Node management for massive scale deployments.
Performance Core: Migrated task orchestration to local SQL storage for improved reliability and speed.
Refined Design: Professional branding transition with glassmorphic aesthetics and high-density adaptive layouts.
